thread.title: San Mateo County to experiment with mail-only voting
thread.title_full: San Mateo County to experiment with mail-only voting - San Francisco Chronicle

author: John Wildermuth
title: San Mateo County to experiment with mail-only voting
text:
Photo: Terray Sylvester, The Chronicle Kevin Mullin authored the all-mail voting bill. Kevin Mullin authored the all-mail voting bill.
Ready or not, San Mateo County voters are about to get an up-close and personal look at the future of California elections. Kevin Mullin authored the all-mail voting bill. Kevin Mullin authored the all-mail voting bill.
Ready or not, San Mateo County voters are about to get an up-close and personal look at the future of California elections.
